ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des: "This is great for creating a small amount of a great dressing for any salad greens, but mesclun greens seem to go with this really well."
ins: Combine olive oil, mustard, vinegar, salt, and pepper in a Mason jar or container with a tight-fitting lid; cover tightly with the lid and shake vigorously until thickened, about 2 minutes. Taste dressing and adjust flavor with salt and pepper.
